waypoints.onload:
__WPL:setWaypointIndex(1)
function getShrooms(_shroom) if _shroom == "Rita" and inventory:itemTotalCount(204672) ~= 1 then moveAndGather(112893, 422335) -- Rita Mushroom return end if _shroom == "Dilili" and inventory:itemTotalCount(204623) ~= 10 then moveAndGather(112884, 422293) -- Dilili Mushroom return end if _shroom == "Kawa" and inventory:itemTotalCount(204670) ~= 5 then moveAndGather(112894, 422335) -- Kawa Mushroom return end if _shroom == "White" and inventory:itemTotalCount(204584) ~= 5 then moveAndGather(112823, 422304) -- White Pocket Mushroom return end if _shroom == "Brown" and inventory:itemTotalCount(204671) ~= 3 then moveAndGather(112892, 422335) -- Dark Brown Mushroom return end end
waypoints.waypoint: player:target_NPC(112873) -- Ailkiss AcceptQuestByName(422287) -- Don't Tell Master Belintan
player:target_NPC(112840) -- Yarvis CompleteQuestByName(422323) -- Passing on a Note AcceptQuestByName(422324) -- A Distraction player:dismount()

player:target_NPC(112849) -- Dilothian CompleteQuestByName(422334) -- Dancing With Birds AcceptQuestByName(422335) -- Spore Grove Resource War
player:target_NPC(112829) -- Walogowbi AcceptQuestByName(422308) -- Troublemaker's Request

player:target_NPC(112883) -- Rodiie AcceptQuestByName(422292) -- Mushrooms Not Muttering player:target_NPC(112883) -- Rodiie ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_422335_3")) -- "Do you know what the effects of Dilili Mushrooms are?"

player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi CompleteQuestByName(422308) -- Troublemaker's Request AcceptQuestByName(422309) -- Troublemaker's Fate AcceptQuestByName(422304) -- Wilderness Survival Code player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_422335_1")) -- "Excuse me, what are the properties of Flame Red Mushrooms?"
player:target_NPC(112829) -- Walogowbi inventory:useItem(204587) -- Wand player:target_NPC(112829) -- Walogowbi CompleteQuestByName(422309) -- Troublemaker's Fate player:mount()
player:target_NPC(112844) -- Torchas CompleteQuestByName(422114) -- Unification of Body and Mind AcceptQuestByName(422115) -- Outdoors Homework
if inventory:itemTotalCount(204619) == 0 then repeat player:target_Object(112880) -- Crystal Potion yrest(1000) until inventory:itemTotalCount(204619) == 1 end player:mount()

player:target_NPC(112841) -- Argily CompleteQuestByName(422326) -- The Final Ingredient AcceptQuestByName(422342) -- Mysterious Divining Instrument player:target_NPC(112841) -- Argily ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_112841_0")) -- 'I want to try divination' math.randomseed(os.time()) pick = "SC_112841_"..math.random(2, 4) ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT(pick)) -- 'You select the instrument on the left/in the middle/on the right' player:target_NPC(112841) -- Argily if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422342, 1) -- Mysterious Divining Instrument inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224402) -- Foresight Satin Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then CompleteQuestByName(422342, 2) -- Mysterious Divining Instrument inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224403) -- Unpredictable Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN then CompleteQuestByName(422342, 3) -- Mysterious Divining Instrument inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224404) -- Journey's Beginning end
player:target_NPC(112833) -- Shewayana AcceptQuestByName(422312) -- Miserable Joke
CatchMobSetup(102020, 60, 204591, 422312) killForQuest(true, 102020, 422312)

yrest(2000) if getQuestStatus(422312) == "incomplete" then yrest(50000) -- Respawn time for Mila is about 48 seconds. __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Mila")) end CatchMobSetup(0, 0, 0, 0)

player:target_NPC(112833) -- Shewayana if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422312, 1) -- Miserable Joke inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224393) -- Mila's Hot Tempered Shoulder Pads elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then CompleteQuestByName(422312, 2) -- Miserable Joke inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224394) -- Prankster Shoulder Guards elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN then CompleteQuestByName(422312, 3) -- Miserable Joke inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224395) -- Trickster Shoulder Guards end player:mount()
player:target_NPC(112873) -- Ailkiss CompleteQuestByName(422287) -- Don't Tell Master Belintan AcceptQuestByName(422288) -- Special Elven Food
player:target_Object(112874) yrest(2000) if getQuestStatus(422288) == "complete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Ailkiss")) end
player:target_Object(112874) yrest(2000) if getQuestStatus(422288) == "complete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Ailkiss")) end

targetAndUse(101928, 204621, 422289) -- Special Elven Food / Lively Ent / Thunderbolt Pet LI03 targetAndUse(112876, 204621, 422289)
player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30276, 2132), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30394, 2128), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30516, 2144), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30633, 2149), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30746, 2151), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30858, 2153), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(30966, 2145), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(31074, 2200), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(31186, 2246), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(31255, 2325), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(31338, 2418), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food player:moveTo(CWaypoint(31426, 2500), true) yrest(2000) inventory:useItem(204621) -- Special Elven Food

player:target_NPC(112873); -- Ailkiss if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422289, 1) -- Thunderbolt Pet LI03 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224396) -- Thunderbolt Pet Pants elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then CompleteQuestByName(422289, 2) -- Thunderbolt Pet LI03 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224397) -- Lively End Pants elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN then CompleteQuestByName(422289, 3) -- Thunderbolt Pet LI03 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224398) -- Elf Luring Pants end AcceptQuestByName(422290) -- Trap Again player:mount()
if inventory:itemTotalCount(204619) == 0 then repeat player:target_Object(112880) -- Crystal Potion yrest(1000) until inventory:itemTotalCount(204619) == 1 end player:mount()
player:target_NPC(112873) -- Ailkiss CompleteQuestByName(422290) -- Trap Again

wolf = player:findNearestNameOrId(101931) -- Plains Wolf if wolf and 120 > distance(wolf, player) then player:target(wolf) player:fight() yrest(1000) end if inventory:itemTotalCount(204629) == 0 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("WolfFur")) end

player:target_NPC(112848) -- Aiman ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_422115_0")) -- 'Are you afraid of Plains Wolves?' yrest(1000) ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_422115_2")) -- 'Look at the Fistful of Plains Wolf Fur in my hands. Actually, it's not that difficult.' yrest(1000) ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_422115_4")) -- 'I'll try! You can only succeed if you try, right?' if getQuestStatus(422115) == "incomplete" then repeat yrest(1000) until getQuestStatus(422115) == "complete" end player:mount()
player:target_NPC(112878) -- Liri CompleteQuestByName(422292) -- Mushrooms Not Muttering AcceptQuestByName(422293) -- Terrifying Paralyzing Mushroom AcceptQuestByName(422295) -- Stolen Mushrooms

if inventory:itemTotalCount(204672) == 1 then inventory:useItem(204672); -- Rita Mushroom end player:target_NPC(112878) -- Liri CompleteQuestByName(422293) -- Terrifying Paralyzing Mushroom yrest(8000) CompleteQuestByName(422295) -- Stolen Mushrooms AcceptQuestByName(422294) -- This is discouraging!

player:target_NPC(112878) -- Liri CompleteQuestByName(422294) -- This is discouraging! AcceptQuestByName(422296) -- Inform Rodiie
player:target_NPC(112883) -- Rodiie CompleteQuestByName(422296) -- Inform Rodiie AcceptQuestByName(422297) -- Only the Mushroom King...
player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi CompleteQuestByName(422304) -- Wilderness Survival Code AcceptQuestByName(422305) -- Campfire Materials

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112929); -- Dry Hard Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112929) -- Dry Hard Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204586) == 1 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood1")) end

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112843); -- Dry Soft Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112843) -- Dry Soft Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204585) == 1 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood2")) end

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112929); -- Dry Hard Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112929) -- Dry Hard Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204586) == 2 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood3")) end player:mount()

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112843); -- Dry Soft Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112843) -- Dry Soft Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204585) == 2 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood4")) end

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112843); -- Dry Soft Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112843) -- Dry Soft Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204585) == 3 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood5")) end

wood = player:findNearestNameOrId(112843); -- Dry Soft Wood Pile if wood and 30 > distance(wood, player) then player:moveTo(CWaypoint(wood.X, wood.Z), true) yrest(1000) repeat player:target_Object(112843) -- Dry Soft Wood Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(204585) == 4 else yrest(15000) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Wood6")) end player:mount()

player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi CompleteQuestByName(422305) -- Campfire Materials AcceptQuestByName(422306) -- Crisis Management player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_112827_0")) -- 'Yes! I'm ready!'

if getQuestStatus(422306) == "incomplete" then repeat Mitla = player:findNearestNameOrId(102022) if Mitla and 80 > distance(Mitla, player) then player:target(Mitla) player:fight() end until getQuestStatus(422306) == "complete" end

player:target_NPC(112827) -- Augsi if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422306, 1) -- Crisis Management inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224405) -- Decision Gloves elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then CompleteQuestByName(422306, 2) -- Crisis Management inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224406) -- Outdoor Survival Handguards elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN then CompleteQuestByName(422306, 3) -- Crisis Management inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224407) -- Gauntlets of Crisis Prevention end player:mount()
killForQuest(true, 101934, 422297) -- Bolida Wood / Only the Mushroom King...

player:target_NPC(112878) -- Liri if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422297, 1) -- Only the Mushroom King... inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224390) -- Jacket of Numbing Embrace elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then CompleteQuestByName(422297, 2) -- Only the Mushroom King... inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224391) -- Merchant's Leather Jacket elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN then CompleteQuestByName(422297, 3) -- Only the Mushroom King... inventory:update() inventory:useItem(224392) -- Spore Body Guard end

player:target_NPC(112849) -- Dilothian if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE then CompleteQuestByName(422335, 1) -- Spore Grove Resource War inventory:update() item = inventory:findItem(224418) -- Kawa's Ring item:moveTo("right ring") elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID then CompleteQuestByName(422335, 3) -- Spore Grove Resource War inventory:update() item = inventory:findItem(224420) -- Rita's Ring item:moveTo("right ring") else CompleteQuestByName(422335, 2) -- Spore Grove Resource War inventory:update() item = inventory:findItem(224419) -- Flame Red Ring of Stone item:moveTo("right ring") end AcceptQuestByName(422336) -- Whistle Lake Habitat
player:target_NPC(112844) -- Torchas CompleteQuestByName(422115) -- Outdoors Homework AcceptQuestByName(422116) -- We Can Do It

book = player:findNearestNameOrId(112947) -- Record of the Elven King if book and 50 > distance(book, player) then repeat player:target_Object(112947) -- Record of the Elven King yrest(2000) until inventory:itemTotalCount(204630) == 1 end yrest(2000) player:mount()
player:target_NPC(112879) -- Ima Chenguan AcceptQuestByName(422291) -- Teach Ailkiss A Lesson
player:target_NPC(112873) -- Ailkiss CompleteQuestByName(422291) -- Teach Ailkiss A Lesson
player:target_NPC(112848) -- Aiman CompleteQuestByName(422116, 1) -- We Can Do It
player:target_NPC(112831) -- Sishear AcceptQuestByName(422311) -- Troubling Situation
player:target_NPC(112832) -- Raylishag CompleteQuestByName(422311) -- Troubling Situation yrest(5000) AcceptQuestByName(422307) -- Too Embarrassed to Hand in Homework
loadPaths("ElvenIsland/EI_03_SabineanCave")
